1.0.name: wordpress/joke-of-the-day-advanced
1.0.description: Places a Joke of the Day widget on your Wordpress blog. Features include the ability to only show jokes containing a particular keyword, a switch between 'clean' or 'dirty' jokes, as well as an option to change the current joke early if you get tired of it. Jokes are loaded via ajax from The Internet Joke Database, so your page will never be slowed due to loading jokes.
